snippet: At a tribute to the writer and filmmaker, mourners received pages of her recipes.
abstract: At a tribute to the writer and filmmaker Nora Ephron, mourners received pages of her recipes; such a gesture expertly captured the spirit of her life. A passion for food coursed through her best work, from Heartburn to Julie & Julia.
lead_paragraph: At a tribute to the writer and filmmaker, mourners received pages of her recipes.

headline.seo: Nora Ephron’s Memorial Service, Dish by Dish
headline.main: A Farewell to Nora Ephron, Dish by Dish
headline.print_headline: A Farewell to Nora Ephron, Dish by Dish
